examples: It was a relaxer for him, like doodling.

body_content.explanation: a drug that helps you relax, or that makes part of your body less tense (= tight and stiff):
examples: Temazepam is a drug used as a muscle relaxer or sleeping aid.
Relaxers should be used first, as the narcotics should only be used when other things don't give enough relief.

body_content.explanation: a special chemical for making curly hair straight or less curly:
examples: She packed what she deemed were essentials: cocoa butter, hair relaxer and body spray.
Even if you don't want to spend megabucks on relaxers, book a consultation at your salon so you can learn the right way to do it yourself.
